n1:CountryCodesCustomsOfficeLists.description: This Codelist includes the countries who are maintaining their Customs Offices in CS/RD2. It lists the country codes used as the first two characters of the Customs Office Reference Number. It corresponds to the content of the code list CL009 excluding 'AX', 'GF', 'GG', 'GP', 'IM', 'JE', 'LI', 'MC', 'MF', 'MQ', 'RE', 'SJ', 'XS' and 'YT'. This codelist is used for the Customs Office List. The values of this codelist are also available and updated in CS/RD2.
